chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The REST face provides access to the Geomajas server through a RESTful protocol. The current implementation provides read-only access to the various vector layers configured on the server. Our protocol implementation was largely inspired by the Mapfish protocol, which should be in line with - or at least supported by - the OpenLayers client implementation. We also support clients of FeatureServer, which has a much more limited parameterset. As far as we know, there is currently no REST standard for feature services, although there is some consensus on the rest principles (using uri extensions to determine the output format, exposing single features as uris, etc...).
